name: Basic Research
section_name: Learn about Hispanic resources for research. Vault

choices.name: Learn about Hispanic resources for research.

content.text:
Note : For country-specific research, see the N. America and S. America sections of Countries/Ethnic Groups.

  1. Introduction: Get an introduction to Hispanic research.

    ☆ TH—Researching Your Hispanic Heritage - 2019
    ☆ BYU—Beginning Latin American Research: Introduction to the Records—62:15 - 2016



  2. Overview: Here is an overview of Hispanic research from the Ancestry Wiki.

    ☆ AC—Wiki: Hispanic Research

  3. Explore this Hispanic Genealogy Guide.

    ☆ Hispanic Genealogy Guide

  4. Resources: Get an introduction to Hispanic research and sources.

    ☆ AC—Hispanic Family History
    ☆ FS—Intro to Hispanic Research—63:35 - 2014

  5. Searches: Learn techniques for improving your Hispanic record searches in this FamilySearch article.

    ☆ FS—Improve Your Search Results for Hispanic Ancestors

  6. Mexico and Spain: Learn how to trace your hispanic heritage in Mexico and Spain.

    ☆ PR—Tracing Hispanic Roots in Mexico and Spain

  7. Church and Slave Records: Learn about the preservation of church records in Latin America that document slaves.

    ☆ Moldy Church Records in Latin America Document the Lives of Millions of Slaves - 2017

choices.name: Learn about Hispanic surnames and naming customs.

content.text:
1. Surnames: Learn about Latin American surname customs.
  2. See examples of toponymic and patronymic surnames. To learn more about surname research and other Hispanic research topics, visit the Abueling.com blog.
  3. Read these articles to learn more about Spanish surnames.

    ☆ TH—Spanish Surname Meanings and Origins - 2018
    ☆ Spanish Last Names - 2018

  4. Naming Customs: Learn more about Spanish naming customs.

    ☆ FS—Paleogra-what?! Deciphering Spanish Handwriting - Spanish Names—5:10 - 2018

  5. Challenges: Learn how to overcome challenges with Hispanic name research.

    ☆ AC—Researching Hispanic Family History—5:13 - 2016

choices.name: Learn how to read Spanish handwritten records.

content.text:
1. Introduction: Get an introduction to Spanish handwriting.

    ☆ FS—Paleogra-what?! Deciphering Spanish Handwriting - Introduction—1:14 - 2018

  2. Alphabet: Learn about the Spanish alphabet.

    ☆ FS—The Spanish Alphabet

  3. Words and Dates: Learn about Spanish names and dates.

    ☆ FS—Reading Spanish Handwritten Records Lesson 2: Words and Dates—5:10 - 2018

  4. Handwriting: Learn about Spanish paleography.

    ☆ FS—Paleogra-what?! Deciphering Spanish Handwriting - Spanish Dates—2:23 - 2018
    ☆ BYU—Spanish Paleography—48:41 - 2022



  5. Learn about handwriting resources for the Spanish Colonial period.

    ☆ RT—Spanish Colonial Period Paleographic Materials Online—34:15 - 2021


Records
  1. Spanish: Learn to read Spanish-language records.

    ☆ FS—Reading Spanish Records—2:00 - 2018
    ☆ AC—Researching Spanish-Language Records

  2. Birth & Baptism: Learn about key terms for birth and baptism records.

    ☆ FS—Paleogra-what?! Deciphering Spanish Handwriting - Key Terms: Births and Baptisms—3:28 - 2018

  3. Marriage: Learn about key terms for marriage records.

    ☆ FS—Paleogra-what?! Deciphering Spanish Handwriting - Key Terms: Marriages—4:22 - 2018

  4. Death & Burial: Learn about key terms for death and burial records.

    ☆ FS—Paleogra-what?! Deciphering Spanish Handwriting - Key Terms: Deaths and Burials—3:06 - 2018

  5. Resources: Learn about online resources for deciphering Spanish handwriting.

    ☆ FS—Paleogra-what?! Deciphering Spanish Handwriting - Online Resources—4:19

choices.name: Learn more about researching your Hispanic ancestors.

content.text:
1. Place of Origin: Learn to find the place of origin for U.S. hispanic immigrants.

    ☆ FS—Hispanic Online Resources—19:02 - 2012

  2. More: Learn more about researching your ancestors in Latin America.

    ☆ FS—Researching Your Ancestors in Latin America, Part 2 - 2014
    ☆ FS—Researching Your Ancestors in Latin America, Part 3 - 2014

  3. Learn about researching your ancestors in Central America.

    ☆ BYU—Discovering Your Ancestors in Central America—54:30 - 2021

choices.name: Explore more resources for Hispanic research.

content.text:
1. Find Latin American genealogy resources on the internet.

    ☆ LT—Research Latin America Genealogical Resources on the Internet—72:00
  2. Access the Genealogia Hispana blog site for resources.
  3. Searching: Watch this video to learn techniques for searching Hispanic records.

    ☆ FS—Improve Your Results in Hispanic Record Searches—50:47 - 2016

  4. Church Records: Learn about using church records in Hispanic research.

    ☆ AC—Church Records in Hispanic Research

  5. Books We Own: Explore the ☆Books We Own site for books that can be checked out or researched for you by others.

choices.name: Explore emigration resources for Hispanic research.

content.text:
1. Introduction: Get an introduction Ibero-American emigration.

    ☆ FS—Recursos genealógicos de la emigración Iberoamericana, parte 1: Introducción—2:07 - 2018

  2. Find learning resources for Ibero-American emigration.

    ☆ FS—Recursos genealógicos de la emigración Iberoamericana, parte 1: Recursos de aprendizaje—3:15 - 2018

  3. History: Learn about the history of Spanish immigration.

    ☆ FS—Recursos genealógicos de la emigración Iberoamericana, parte 1: Historia de la emigración Española—6:21 - 2018

  4. Learn about the demographics of Ibero-American immigration.

    ☆ FS—Recursos genealógicos de la emigración Iberoamericana, parte 1: Demografía de la emigración—6:04 - 2018

  5. New Spain: Learn about immigration to New Spain.

    ☆ FS—Northern New Spain—5:43

  6. Learn about immigration to Northern New Spain.

    ☆ FS—Why Migrate?—6:03 - 2018

  7. Reasons: Learn about reasons for immigration to New Spain.

    ☆ FS—Immigrant Sources—6:03 - 2018

  8. History: Learn about record history and jurisdictions.

    ☆ FS—Locating Records—13:19 - 2018

Migration Paths
  1. Learn about the highway for immigration from southern Mexico to New Mexico.

    ☆ FS—El Camino Real—5:05 - 2018

  2. Learn about migration paths from northern Mexico into Texas and Louisiana.

    ☆ FS—Northeastern Mexico and Texas—2:16 - 2018

  3. Learn about migration paths up the Pacific coast of Mexico and California and through the southwest.

    ☆ FS—The Pacific Coast and the Southwest—4:07 - 2018

choices.name: Explore Catholic Church record resources for Latin America.

content.text:
1. Learn about Catholic Church records in Latin America, from the perspective of the parish priest.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Introduction—4:33 - 2017

  2. Strategies: Learn about content and strategies for finding records.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Content and Strategies—1:26 - 2017

  3. Learn how to locate Catholic Church records.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Locating the Records—7:26 - 2017

  4. Baptism: Learn about baptism records.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Baptisms—6:46 - 2017

  5. Marriage: Learn about marriage records.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Marriages—5:02 - 2017

  6. Learn about marriage information files.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Marriage Information Files—5:49 - 2017

  7. Burial & Death: Learn about burial and death records.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Burials/Deaths—4:03 - 2017

  8. Confirmation: Learn about confirmation records.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Confirmations—3:06 - 2017

  9. Indexes: Learn about indexes in Catholic Church records.

    ☆ FS—Through the Eyes of the Parish Priest: Indexes—5:49 - 2017

name: Get Help
section_name: Get help with your Hispanic research.

choices.name: Use Facebook pages to get answers to your questions.

content.text:
1. Visit the ☆Genealogic Society of Hispanic America on Facebook.
  2. Visit the ☆Hispanic Organization for Genealogy and Research on Facebook.
  3. Visit the ☆Hispanic Genealogy Research page on Facebook.
  4. See the Genealogy on Facebook list of Facebook groups dedicated to helping with research for Hispanics.

1. Visit the ☆Hispanic Genealogy Society site for research resources on Northern Mexico, South Texas, California, and New Mexico.
  2. Explore the ☆Genealogical Society Hispanic America Southern California site.

choices.name: Visit message boards and communities for Hispanic research.

content.text:
1. Explore the ☆FamilySearch community for help with Hispanic research.
  2. Use the ☆Ancestry message boards to read or post questions about Hispanic research.
